titleStmt.title: Royall and gracious priviledges, granted by the high and mighty Philip the fourth King of Spaine, &c. March 19. 1645. Vnto the English merchants trading within his dominions. / Translated out of Spanish, and published for the benefit of such, who desire commerce in those parts.
titleStmt.author: Spain. Sovereign (1621-1665 : Philip IV)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, at the Princes Armes in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Armes in Pauls Church-yard
